DOC.brief_summary: To study the postoperative results in myopic and hyperopic eyes treated with two different laser ablation algorithms (STD and F-CAT), both FDA approved.
DOC.brief_title: Corneal Asphericity Adjustment (Q Adjustment) in Myopic and Hyperopic Patients Undergoing Refractive Correction With Excimer Laser
DOC.criteria: Myopic and hyperopic eyes eligible for LASIK or PRK refractive correction Central corneal thickness more than 500 micrometers Topographies of less than 55% of successful total sampled area and eyes exhibiting asphericity variations, in either the horizontal or the vertical axis, greater than 0.2 Corneal scarring Cataract surgery Corneal ulceration Topographical abnormalities
